data.title: April 13, 2022 News and Stories
data.meta_description: Interested in learning more about the things happening at Willamette University? Review events, announcements, updates, and stories from April 13, 2022.
data.text:
Bearcat Day and Access to Excellence

Please join the Office of Admission in welcoming our future Bearcat families to campus.

Sue A Corner

Student Scholarship Recognition Day is here

There will be no classes today in honor of SSRD. Visit the attached link to see today's full schedule.

Mary Martin

The Office of SRL seeks a summer intern (paid position)

The Office of Spiritual and Religious Life is now accepting applications for the Lear Summer Service Internship.

Kimberly E Griggs

Writing Center Closed on April 13

The Writing Center will be closed on Wednesday for SSRD.

Jennifer Jopp

Fifth Annual Juried Student Art Show Reception

Apr 13

Join the Art Department for the reception of our Fifth Annual Juried Student Art Show.

Akeem Olaj spoken word

Apr 15

Join WEB for a cozy night in at the Bistro, featuring spoken word artist Akeem Olaj.
